extendedInfo.description: Pensions & Investments the international media brand of money management.  P&I is an essential resource for the latest news, research and data impacting the day-to-day business of investment professionals for the past 40 years.  We provide coverage of international news and global investment strategy and report on news developments affecting the investments and investments strategies of pension funds, defined contribution plans, endowments, foundations, mutual funds, insurance companies, investment advisers, trust departments and trust companies.  P&I publishes a bi-weekly newspaper, provides daily news updates on our website: pionline.com, publishes seven e-newsletters, hosts more than 20 conferences annually and provides pertinent data and research for the market through P&IQ and P&I Research Center.P&I has hosted the Annual Defined Contribution Conference for nearly 20 years.  It is the premier gathering of retirement professionals serving the defined contribution/401(k) market.  The conference covers the latest in retirement plan design, investments and communication for retirement plan participants.  2013 Conference Location: 	InterContinental Miami 100 Chopin Plaza Miami, FL 33131Registration Hours:		Sunday, March 10, 2013 from 3:30pm â 5:00pm	Monday, March 11, 2013 from 7:30am â 6:30pmTuesday, March 12, 2013 from 7:30am â 3:30pmExhibit Hall Hours: 		Sunday, March 10, 2013 from 5:00pm â 7:00pm	Monday, March 11, 2013 from 7:30am â 6:30pmTuesday, March 12, 2013 from 7:30am â 11:10pm
